author: rfscholte
msg: Remove maven-compat dependency (give it test scope due to maven-plugin-testing-harness)
These are the minimum changes required. Aether has a much more efficient way to install artifacts, so plugin code still needs to be optimized and cleaned up

author: rfscholte
msg: Fix IT: somehow 1.x accepted to install the project, even though there was no jar (due to binding the goals to the initialize phase). Discovered when moving to pure M3 solution with Aether and maven-artifact-transfer

author: hboutemy
msg: renamed committers.json to groups.json and projects field to groups to better match data source, ie LDAP groups
